etymology.description: 陳(陳) (chén, "to arrange; to explain; surname") is a common Chinese surname, and 毅(毅) (yì, "firm; resolute; courageous") represents qualities such as determination and bravery. The name 陈毅(陳毅) (Chén Yì) is a personal name.
etymology.interpretation: 陈毅(陳毅) (Chén Yì) was a prominent Chinese figure known for his leadership during the Chinese Civil War and his role as a marshal in the People's Liberation Army. The name reflects both his family lineage and the personal qualities of firmness and courage.

examples.chinese: 陈毅是一位杰出的军事家(陳毅是一位傑出的軍事家)。
examples.pinyin: Chén Yì shì yí wèi jié chū de jūn shì jiā.
examples.english: Chen Yi is an outstanding military strategist.

examples.chinese: 陈毅曾发表过重要演讲(陳毅曾發表過重要演講)，激励了许多人(激勵了許多人)。
examples.pinyin: Chén Yì céng fā biǎo guò zhòng yào yǎn jiǎng, jī lì le xǔ duō rén.
examples.english: Chen Yi once delivered an important speech, inspiring many people.

examples.chinese: 陈毅在困境中沉着应对(陳毅在困境中沉著應對)，赢得了同志们的尊敬(贏得了同志們的尊敬)。
examples.pinyin: Chén Yì zài kùn jìng zhōng chén zhuó yìng duì, yíng dé le tóng zhì men de zūn jìng.
examples.english: Chen Yi handled adversity calmly and won the respect of his comrades.
